ZBar-sharp Documentation

0.9

Introduction

ZBar# is contains bindings to a subset of the mid-level zbar interfaces, mainly the image scanner and video abstractions. These bindings is in the ZBar namespace (libzbar-cil.dll), and are build against ZBar version 0.9, however, it should also work newer ZBar versions (tested with 0.10).

The GtkZBar namespace (gtkzbar-cil.dll) contains a Gtk# widget for scanning bar codes with Gtk#. The example namespace (example.exe) is an example application that shows how to use the Scanner widget.

Building from source

The source can be build using MonoDevelop or Visual Studio, however, the example needs MonoDevelop for GUI generation. Note, that libzbar must be in the library path as either libzbar.dll or libzbar.so, or Windows and Linux respectively.
